The movie follows Brooke, an actress who finds herself entangled in a love triangle amidst the hustle and bustle of New York City - it's a fun and flirty film that's sure to leave you smiling.

If you're looking for something a bit more serious, I think "A Tale of Two Cities" might be up your alley. This classic tale of love, sacrifice, and redemption has been adapted into many films over the years, but this one features some great performances from its cast, including an iconic turn by Sydney Carton.
